      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.String mac,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    byte[] adv)
        connect with adv
        参数:
        mac - mac
        adv - advertisement 广播

      • startWithoutToken

        public void startWithoutToken(java.lang.String userId,
                              java.lang.String mac)
        Use this when there's no token
        参数:
        userId - 12 bytes. Please format to 12 hex strings, 2 length each, eg. 5a975f9d9f54540329a1112e
        mac - device mac address eg. BC:E5:9F:48:81:3F

      • startWithToken

        public void startWithToken(java.lang.String userId,
                           java.lang.String token)
        Use this when there's a token
        参数:
        userId - 12 bytes. Please format to 12 hex strings, 2 length each
        token - eg. 42,-37,-113,8,-97,-11

      • toggleLive

        public void toggleLive(boolean enable)
        Enable/disable a global live data notification pipe, convenient for ui show. If enabled and monitor on, live data will be notified through MegaBleCallback.onV2Live...
        参数:
        enable - true or false

      • disConnect

        public void disConnect()

      • startDfu

        public void startDfu(java.lang.String mac)

      • syncData

        public void syncData()
        Sync data: spo2, sport. It will automatically use requestConnectionPriority to speed up data transfer.

      • setDebugEnable

        public void setDebugEnable(boolean enable)
        Enable debug if necessary.
        参数:
        enable -

      • ensureBind

        public void ensureBind(boolean ensure)

      • findMe

        public void findMe()

      • enableV2ModeSpoMonitor

        public void enableV2ModeSpoMonitor(boolean ensure)
        Start monitoring spo2 (both spo2 and pr). The device will keep saving data to itself. A disconnection of ble won't interrupt. eg. activities like silent, sleep. Unit: SpO2(%), pr(bpm)
        参数:
        ensure - Please always use true, false is useless now.

      • enableV2ModeSport

        public void enableV2ModeSport(boolean ensure)
        Start monitoring sport (only pr). The device will keep saving data to itself. A disconnection of ble won't interrupt. eg. activities like running, sporting.
        参数:
        ensure - use true

      • enableV2ModeDaily

        public void enableV2ModeDaily(boolean ensure)
        Stop monitoring anything, recover to idle mode.
        参数:
        ensure - use true

      • enableV2ModeLiveSpo

        public void enableV2ModeLiveSpo(boolean ensure)
        Start monitoring spo2 (both spo2 and pr), without saving data to ring itself. Rarely used.
        参数:
        ensure - use true

      • getV2Mode

        public void getV2Mode()
        Get current device's monitoring mode.

      • getV2Batt

        public void getV2Batt()
        Get current device's battery.

      • updateBleConnectionPriority

        public boolean updateBleConnectionPriority(int priority)
        更新蓝牙连接间隔 eg. BluetoothGatt.CONNECTION_PRIORITY_BALANCED

      • parseSpoPr

        public void parseSpoPr(byte[] bytes,
                       MegaAuth.Callback<ParsedSpoPrBean> callback)
        参数:
        bytes - Parse the synced data for spo2 (both spo2 and pr).
        callback - sdk auth

      • parseSport

        public void parseSport(byte[] bytes,
                       MegaAuth.Callback<ParsedPrBean> callback)
        参数:
        bytes - Parse the synced data for sport (only pr).
        callback - sdk auth
